divs: sighting detailson june 12th, 2008 i was driving my bus west bound on belmont ave. in chicago. i caught a red (2-1\2 min.) stop light on ashland ave. i looked through my windshield and saw a bright white light in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane, but i realized there were no flashing lights where the wings should be. i continued to watch the object which appeared to be stationary in the sky. as i stared i saw it move slightly north and realized it had changed position and was now facing me. i saw it was not moving and realized it was a large v shaped object with white lights down each side. again i looked for flashing lights, there weren't any. i kept staring even as the passengers were boarding. i again thought maybe i was seeing things and tried to find a fixed point in the sky to see if the object would cross it. suddenly it moved east. if i was to approximate a distance i would say about 8 inches if i held a 12 in. ruler straight out and to the sky. it stopped, and the white lights began to fade into a gray then black. i thought it would disappear, but suddenly the color turned into a stop light green and just hung in the sky. i started rolling down the street again and the object fade from view behind the bus. four blocks later on damen ave., to my surprise, the object again was in the windshield of the bus, hanging in the sky. i watched the lights once again turn from white to green and not move. i remember thinking while the lights were white that they seemed to be in blocks as if windows. i have no idea why i thought that. when they started changing color they did not go horizontally across the side but vertically so i could still see the white at the bottom turn into grey then black then bam! into green. there were very high light clouds in the sky. i realized later the object was muich larger than a plane or helicopter. the v shape was so perfectly surrouding by the lights there was no center light, they went down the outside and seemed to meet perfectly at the front end point. as i drove home that evening i kept watching the sky for it to reappear but i didn't see it again. when it moved each time, i almost felt as if it was in answer to my question "did it move or not?" each time i questioned myself it moved. i thought that was very creepy.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: V shaped object spotted in Chicago 6-12-08 at 1922 hours.
